alert.note: Alert for Mason; Thurston (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued October 07 at 12:40PM PDT by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PDT SUNDAY NIGHT... An Air Quality Alert for Smoke has been issued by the following agency: Olympic Region Clean Air Agency until midnight PDT Sunday night. The air quality is expected to be unhealthy for sensitive groups. The overall air quality will be moderate for most the Puget Sound for the next few days from wildfire smoke. All sensitive groups should limit spending any time outdoors. People with health conditions may have worsened symptoms. We do not expect rain for at least the next few days, and onshore winds will be light, so the smoke is expected to linger. For the latest information on pollution levels, visit www.orcaa.org. When pollution levels are high, try to find clean indoor air or use an air filter if possible.
